Verses: 1 sarvavallavarukkuk Kaalangal Maraikkappadaadhirukka, Avarai Arindhavargal Avar Niyamiththa Naatkalai Ariyaadhirukkiradhenna?
2 silar Ellaik Kurippugalai Otri, Mandhaigalai Balaadhkaaramaai Saaiththukkondupoi Patchikkiraargal.
3 thaai Thagappan Illaadhavargalin Kazhudhaiyai Ottikkondupoi, Vidhavaiyin Maattai Eedaaga Eduththukkollugiraargal.
4 thesaththil Sirumaippattavargal Egamaai Oliththukkollaththakkadhaaga, Elimaiyaanavargalai Vazhiyaivittu Vilakkugiraargal.
5 idho, Avargal Kaattukkazhudhaigalaippola Iraitheda Adhikaalame Thangal Velaikkup Purappadugiraargal; Vanaandharavelidhaan Avargalukkum Avargal Pillaigalukkum Aagaaram Kodukkavendum.
6 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vayalil Avargal Avanukkaaga Aruppu Aruththu, Avanudaiya Dhraatchath Thottaththin Pazhangalai Serkkiraargal.
7 kulirile Porththukkollugiradharku Ondrum Illaadhadhinaal, Vasthiramillaamal Raaththangi,
8 malaigalilirundhu Varum Mazhaigalile Nanaindhu, Odhukkidamillaadhadhinaal Kanmalaiyile Andikkollugiraargal.
9 avargalo Thagappanillaadha Pillaiyai Mulaiyaivittup Pariththu, Thariththiran Porththukkondirukkiradhai Adaguvaangugiraargal.
10 avanai Vasthiramillaamal Nadakkavum, Pattiniyaai Arikkattugalai Sumakkavum,
11 thangal Madhilgalukkulle Sekkaattavum, Thaagaththavanamaai Aalaiyaattavum Pannugiraargal.
12 ooril Manushar Thavikkiraargal, Kutruyiraaik Kidakkiravargalin Aaththumaa Kooppidugiradhu; Endraalum, Dhevan Adhaik Kutramaaga Avargalmel Sumaththugiradhillai.
13 avargal Velichchaththukku Virodhamaai Nadakkiravargalin Koottaththaar; Avargal Avarudaiya Vazhigalai Ariyaamalum, Avarudaiya Paadhaigalil Tharikkaamalum Irukkiraargal.
14 kolaipaadhagan Pozhudhu Vidigirapodhu Ezhundhu, Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanaik Kondru, Raakkaalaththile Thirudanaippol Thirigiraan.
15 vibasaaranudaiya Kan Maalaimayangugira Velaikkuk Kaaththirundhu: Ennai Oru Kannum Kaanamaattaadhendru Mugaththai Moodikkollugiraan.
16 avargal Pagalil Adaiyaalam Paarththa Veedugalai Iruttile Kannamidugiraargal; Avargal Velichchaththai Ariyaargal.
17 vidiyunkaalamum Avargalukku Marana Irulpol Irukkiradhu; Appadippattavan Marana Irulin Bayangaraththodu Pazhagiyirukkiraan.
18 neerottaththaippol Theeviramaaip Povaan; Dhesaththil Avan Pangu Sabikkappattup Pogiradhinaal, Avan Dhraatchaththottangalin Vazhiyai Inik Kaanbadhillai.
19 varatchiyum Ushnamum Uraindha Mazhaiyaip Patchikkum; Appadiye Paadhaalamaanadhu Paavigalaip Patchikkum.
20 avanaip Petra Karppam Avanai Marakkum; Puzhu Thirupthigaramaai Avanaith Thinnum; Avan Appuram Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Akkiramamaanadhu Pattamaraththaippola Murindhuvizhum.
21 pillaiperaadha Maladiyin Aasthiyaip Patchiththuvittu, Vidhavaikku Nanmai Seyyaadhepogiraan.
22 than Balaththinaale Vallavargalaith Than Paarisamaakkugiraan; Avan Ezhumbugirapodhu Oruvanukkum Praananaippatri Nichchayamillai.
23 dhevan Avanukku Sugavaazhvaik Kattalaiyittaal, Adhinmel Urudhiyaai Nambikkai Vaikkiraan; Aanaalum Avarudaiya Kangal Appadippattavargalin Vazhigalukku Virodhamaayirukkiradhu.
24 avargal Konjakkaalam Uyarndhirundhu, Kaanaamarpoi, Thaazhththappattu, Matra Ellaaraippolum Adakkappadugiraargal; Kadhirgalin Nuniyaippola Arukkappadugiraargal.
25 appadiyillaiyendru Ennaip Poiyanaakki En Vaarththaigalai Viyarththamaakkaththakkavan Yaar Endraan.
